abstract: Produced by the Australian Commonwealth Film Unit for the Department of Territories in 1959. A look at Goroka's coffee plantations and the annual Goroka Show.
description: Capital of the Eastern Highlands Province of Papua New Guinea, Goroka's cash crops focus on coffee growing.  Goroka also has an annual show which is a three day event coinciding with Papua New Guineas' Independance day (September 16).
